text: A goat went over the flock and was caught by a wolf chasing after him. And he turned to him, and said, I know, wolf-master, that I am destined to be thy lunch. But to avoid dying without honor, play the flute and I will dance one last time. And they did so, but the dogs, who were not far away, heard the noise and went out to pursue the wolf. And the wolf saw the evil passing, and said to himself, This thing is right with me; for I am a hunter, and I should not have played the flute. Before you do any new activity, consider your abilities.
title: El lobo flautista y el cabrito
author: nan Esopo
